azurerm_proximity_placement_group.description: Manages a proximity placement group for virtual machines, virtual machine scale sets and availability sets.

name.description: Specifies the name of the availability set. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the availability set. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

id.description: The ID of the Proximity Placement Group.

create.description: Used when creating the Proximity Placement Group.

update.description: Used when updating the Proximity Placement Group.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Proximity Placement Group.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Proximity Placement Group.
